items.sentence: I don\'t think Tom will put up much of a fight.
Why don\'t you try and trust Tom a little more?
I didn\'t know about it until I read the paper.
I didn\'t know about that until quite recently.
I didn\'t know for certain which train to take.
I didn\'t know he had decided to leave his job.
I didn\'t know that your mother lived with you.
I didn\'t know you were going to be here today.
I\'m sorry, but my mother is out at the moment.
I\'m sure a lot of people would agree with you.
I\'m sure the police will catch the kidnappers.
The fog began to disappear around ten o\'clock.
Don\'t sign the document until you\'ve read it.
Everybody knows that we don\'t like each other.
Everyone here knows that Tom doesn\'t eat pork.
Everyone\'s been complaining about the new tax.
I was as surprised by Tom\'s death as you were.
I was so excited that I couldn\'t sleep a wink.
You used to have really long hair, didn\'t you?
You won\'t be able to talk Tom into doing that.
